original_title: 102,000 tourist arrivals within the first 15 days of 2024
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 102,000 tourists have arrived in Sri Lanka within the first 15 days of 2024.
Chairman of the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority (SLTDA) Priyantha Fernando said the same number of tourist arrivals was recorded during the first month of last year.
